## IProject.isReady property

Shows whether the project is ready to be used. Better to use [IProject.ready](./core.iproject.ready.md)<!-- -->, which is a promise that would resolve when the project is ready.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly isReady: boolean;
```
